title: Item
description: Stores information about each item that can be part of a user's collection.

title.description: The title of the item (e.g., the name of the book, movie, or comic).

itemType.description: The type of the item (e.g., book, movie, game, comic).

description.description: A brief description or summary of the item.

isLendable.description: Information about whether the user (owner) would lend the item.

ownershipStatus.description: Information about whether the user owns the item, wishes to buy it, has borrowed it, etc.

status.description: Information about whether the item has been read/watched, is currently being read/watched, or is on a to-read/to-watch list.
